summary: An ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 849 for the improvement of Hillman Place from East 60th Street to East 65th Street, and certain portions of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein a system of fire hydrants, under Ordinance No. 10070 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
